name: Furry Friends
description:
Furry Friends: EmBark on a Journey

WHack Fall 2017

Make some furry friends from the shelter in this short game about doggy love.
We love dogs and games and this is what came of it. 

Includes:
- 4 Routes
- Branching options
- 3 Cute dogs to choose from
- terrier-ble puns and jokes

Made by Sarah Chang, Rosalinda Xiong, and Jessica Zou with love.
